biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Iemasa Kayumi  (born October 31, 1932) is a Japanese voice actor, actor, and narrator from the Tokyo Metropolitan area. He is currently affiliated with 81 Produce.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Iemasa Kayumi, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia
